snippet: A petition to the White House complaining about a “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” segment in which a child suggested killing “everyone in China” to alleviate Amerca’s national debt has drawn more than 100,000 signatures, a threshold that requires an...
abstract: A petition to the White House complaining about a “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” segment in which a child suggested killing “everyone in China” to alleviate Amerca’s national debt has drawn more than 100,000 signatures, a threshold that requires an official response from the Obama administration.

headline.main: TV Skit That Offended Chinese May Get White House Response
